data.eml:eml: Redescriptions of two closely related East Asian flatfish species of the genus Pleuronichthys

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yokogawa, Kōji, Watanabe, Ken-Ichi, Ogihara, Gota (2016): Redescriptions of two closely related East Asian flatfish species of the genus Pleuronichthys. Zootaxa 4205 (1): 1-23, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.1.1
